name: Alpine Pals
description:
Take control of Bob and Buck two climers that wish for conquer all mountains.

      

Both of them are tied by a rope, a rope that helps them to overcome obstacles and help each other out. But be carefull, no one can climb forever. They will need to take a rest every once in a while, so be aware of the stamina usage.

This game is part of the #SGDJamIII

Was created by @AlVance and glowen up by @GranJ_Dev

You can download the executable and play! Don't forget to leave your coments!!

----------------------------------------------

INSTRUCTIONS:
  • Bob's controls scheme:
    • A/D --> Impulse left/right.
    • RCtrl + WASD --> Climb. 
  • Buck's controls scheme:
    • RArrow/LArrow -->; Impulse left/right.
    • LCtrl + Arrows --> Climb.
  • If a player stands of top of the other one while its climbing it will get tired faster.
  • If a player runs out of stamina, it will need to get rest until the stamina bar is filled.
  • It quite recommendable to play the game with a friend :)
